name: Pathologic Classic HD

task.name: winetricks
task.app: corefonts d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9 devenum quartz tahoma wmp9 wmp10

task.description: Changing to Windows XP to install video codec (otherwise it will fail)
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- codecs: https://lutris.net/files/tools/windowsmedia-kb942423-x86-intl.exe
game:
  appid: 384110
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: corefonts d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9 devenum quartz tahoma wmp9 wmp10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Changing to Windows XP to install video codec (otherwise it will
      fail)
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /q
    description: Installing video codecs
    executable: codecs
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Changing to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
